name: discovery-bib-poster
description: Reads bibs/items from stream, posts to bib or item service
author: NYPL

scripts.deploy-bib-qa: node-lambda deploy --functionName BibPoster --environment qa --configFile ./config/bib-qa.env --role arn:aws:iam::946183545209:role/lambda-full-access -b subnet-21a3b244,subnet-f35de0a9 -g sg-aa74f1db --profile nypl-digital-dev -S ./config/event-sources-bib-qa
scripts.deploy-item-qa: node-lambda deploy --functionName ItemPoster --environment qa --configFile ./config/item-qa.env --role arn:aws:iam::946183545209:role/lambda-full-access -b subnet-21a3b244,subnet-f35de0a9 -g sg-aa74f1db --profile nypl-digital-dev -S ./config/event-sources-item-qa
